name: EasyTaskerforAsana
0:
”Alexa, open Easy Task”
”Create a task with the name Sample task name”
”help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: easy task
Developer Terms of Use
des: Meet EasyTasker for Asana, your ultimate task management companion on Alexa. Effortlessly sync your Asana tasks and projects to Alexa, enabling seamless hands-free task management. Simply ask Alexa to create new task, all without lifting a finger. Stay organized and productive with EasyTasker for Asana, your intuitive solution for managing tasks anytime, anywhere.
